snippet: Since the arrests of a dozen students on suspicion of sex-related crimes, members of the Venice High School community in Los Angeles have been doing some soul-searching.
abstract: Members of community around Venice High School in Los Angeles are dealing with revelation that 14 high school boys were involved in sex acts with two underage girls; school is weighing how it could have prevented incident and might avert similar occurrences in future.
lead_paragraph: Since the arrests of a dozen students on suspicion of sex-related crimes, members of the Venice High School community in Los Angeles have been doing some soul-searching.

headline.main: Accusations of Sex Crimes Unnerve Venice High School
headline.print_headline: Accusations of Assaults Unnerve High School
